title: Bg. 11.28
sanskrit: यथा नदीनां बहवोऽम्बुवेगा:समुद्रमेवाभिमुखा द्रवन्ति ।तथा तवामी नरलोकवीराविशन्ति वक्‍त्राण्यभिविज्‍वलन्ति ॥ २८ ॥
transliteration: yathā nadīnāṁ bahavo ’mbu-vegāḥsamudram evābhimukhā dravantitathā tavāmī nara-loka-vīrāviśanti vaktrāṇy abhivijvalanti
literary_trans: As the many waves of the rivers flow into the ocean, so do all these great warriors enter blazing into Your mouths.As the many waves of the rivers flow into the ocean, so do all these great warriors enter blazing into Your mouths.
